# Arpeggio: Dominant 7#5 in C# (Shape: E)

## Presentation
This arpeggio features the notes C# (Root), E# (Major 3rd), G## (Augmented 5th), and B (Minor 7th). It is commonly associated with jazz and fusion music due to its rich and colorful sound.

## Notes and Intervals
- C# (Root)
- E# (Major 3rd)
- G## (Augmented 5th)
- B (Minor 7th)

## Musical Flavor and Genre
The Dominant 7#5 arpeggio in C# has a tense and dissonant sound due to the augmented 5th interval. When used in music, it creates a sense of unresolved tension, adding a spicy flavor to compositions. This arpeggio is often utilized in jazz, fusion, and experimental music for its sophisticated and complex sound.
